you can easily copy and paste all of your free form survey responses from SurveyMonkey, TypeForm and more right here into Aurelius with our Bulk Input feature and create separate notes, all individually tagged and organized!

check out more in our help article here: https://intercom.help/aurelius/notes-in-aurelius/notes-overview
BUG: Additional comments, Save and Add Another Goal, and Save Goal buttons weren’t displaying. (then showed after refreshing a couple times"

Signing in for the first time and changing my password was kind of weird, but I assume that's mostly because this is a beta product and my email had to be added manually by you guys. I didn't get the automated email(s I was supposed to, but I understand the plan is to use a different tool for that anyways, so I'm not sure how relevant that is as feedback. Otherwise, things seemed to go ok for the first week.
Very easy to use. Copied research notes from OneNote.
